text: Kevin David Kiner (born September 3, 1958) is an American composer. == Early life == Kiner was born in San Bernardino, California to Jewish English parents whose families from Belarus, Hungary, Moldova, Poland, Russia and Ukraine. == Career == He then began traveling the world as a musical director for an international touring group before settling in Hollywood, where he began composing for a film and television. == Personal life == Kiner has two sons named Sean Kiner and Dean Kiner with his Filipino wife Narcisa Franco. == Filmography == === Film === === Television === === Video games === == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1958 births Category:American movie score composers Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Living people Category:People from San Bernardino, California
title: Kevin Kiner
